site_sampling_feature_type.name: Site
site_sampling_feature_type.definition: A facility or location at which observations have been collected.

visit_method_type.name: Site Visit
visit_method_type.definition: A method for performing a site visit action.

visit_action_type.name: Site Visit
visit_action_type.definition: A field visit action in which a single site is visited for one or more other possible actions.

research_organization_type.name: Research institute
research_organization_type.definition: An organization founded to conduct research.

usu_affiliation.primary_address: Logan, Utah, United States, Earth, Solar Sytem, Milky Way Galaxy, Local Group, Virgo Supercluster

deployment_method_type.name: Instrument deployment
deployment_method_type.definition: A method for deploying an instrument to make observations at a sampling feature.

temperature_unit_type.name: Temperature
temperature_unit_type.definition: A temperature is a numerical measure of hot and cold.

climate_variable_type.name: Climate
climate_variable_type.definition: Variables associated with the climate, weather, or atmospheric processes.

series_coverage_result_type.name: Time series coverage
series_coverage_result_type.definition: A series of ResultValues for a single Variable, measured on or at a single SamplingFeature of fixed location, using a single Method, with specific Units, having a specific ProcessingLevel, but measured over time.

ongoing_result_status.name: Ongoing
ongoing_result_status.definition: Data collection is ongoing. New data values will be added periodically.

air_medium.name: Air
air_medium.definition: Specimen collection of ambient air or sensor emplaced to measure properties of ambient air.

time_unit_type.name: Time
time_unit_type.definition: Time is a basic component of the measuring system used to sequence events, to compare the durations of events and the intervals between them, and to quantify the motions of objects.

continuous_aggregation_statistic.name: Continuous
continuous_aggregation_statistic.definition: A quantity specified at a particular instant in time measured with sufficient frequency (small spacing) to be interpreted as a continuous record of the phenomenon.

non_detect_censor_code.name: Non-detect
non_detect_censor_code.definition: The value was reported as a non-detect.

good_quality_code.name: Good
good_quality_code.definition: A quality assessment has been made and all data quality objectives have been met.
